name: Castle of the Stolen Stars
description:
Castle of the Stolen Stars is a rogue-lite homage to classic games like Castle of the Winds, made for the 2021 "Touch the Stars" game jam.

Choose one of three characters and set out on your adventure through a world covered in night. Journey out, die, and head out again as you quest to reclaim the stolen stars.

Features:

  • Original Soundtrack and Pixel Art Graphics
  • Randomized events on static maps (each time you set out you will find you encounter different challenges and treasures)
  • Turn-based Combat
  • Trait-based challenges and narrative options
  • An atmospheric narrative

Feedback is welcome! I plan to develop this further after the jam concludes.
